abstract: Baseball Roundup; Kansas City Royals beat St Louis Cardinals, 5-0; other baseball scores noted.
lead_paragraph: J.D. Martinez’s three-run shot supported Alfredo Simon’s strong pitching over seven innings as Detroit knocked off visiting Houston, 6-2.

headline.main: Royals Top Cardinals; Home Run Lifts Tigers
headline.print_headline: Royals Top Cardinals; Home Run Lifts Tigers

snippet: J.D. Martinez’s three-run shot supported Alfredo Simon’s strong pitching over seven innings as Detroit knocked off visiting Houston, 6-2.
